## Setup

## Read in the data

```{r}
df <- read_csv(here::here("data", "uscases.csv"))
```

## Figtest

```{r}
mtcars |> 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = hp, 
                       y = mpg)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth() + 
  labs(title = "This is the plot I want")
```
